mapper.sql: id, station_id, year, month, device_name, stat_type, stat_val, stat_date, create_dttm, update_dttm
mapper.insert: insert into t_station_device_stat (id, station_id, year, month, device_name, stat_type, stat_val, stat_date, create_dttm, update_dttm) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stat_val = #{statVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, update_dttm = now()

insert into t_station_device_stat
id,
station_id,
year,
month,
device_name,
stat_type,
stat_val,
stat_date,
create_dttm,
update_dttm,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{statVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{statDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_station_device_stat
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stat_type = #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stat_val = #{statVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stat_date = #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE},
create_dttm = #{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_dttm = #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_station_device_stat set station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stat_type = #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stat_val = #{statVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, stat_date = #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_dttm = #{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_dttm = #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from ( SELECT t.year, t.month, t.device_name deviceName, sum(t.stat_val) realPower, sum(t1.stat_val) realHour FROM t_station_device_stat t LEFT JOIN t_station_device_stat t1 ON t.station_id = t1.station_id and t.device_name = t1.device_name AND t1.stat_date = t.stat_date AND t.stat_type = 3 AND t1.stat_type = 6 WHERE t.station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by t.device_name,t.year,t.month ) a

select count(1) from ( SELECT t.year, t.device_name deviceName, sum(t.stat_val) realPower, sum(t1.stat_val) realHour FROM t_station_device_stat t LEFT JOIN t_station_device_stat t1 ON t.station_id = t1.station_id and t.device_name = t1.device_name AND t1.stat_date = t.stat_date AND t.stat_type = 3 AND t1.stat_type = 6 WHERE t.station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by t.device_name,t.year ) a
